name: mern-testing-app
description: MERN stack application with comprehensive testing

scripts.install-all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration && npm run test:e2e
scripts.test:unit: concurrently "cd client && npm run test:unit" "cd server && npm run test:unit"
scripts.test:integration: concurrently "cd client && npm run test:integration" "cd server && npm run test:integration"
scripts.test:coverage: concurrently "cd client && npm run test:coverage" "cd server && npm run test:coverage"
